link.script: Object.seal && [ Object, Array, String, Number ].map( function( builtin ) { Object.seal( builtin.prototype ); } );

div.p: Our on-going goal with Steam is to improve the service we offer customers. We believe that by sharing this data, we'll be able to spot problems earlier, improve the Steam service more efficiently, and ultimately build better products and experiences. Let us know what you think.
